Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Inn at the Opera, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from War Memorial Opera House and minutes from California State Building. This family-friendly condo is close to Union Square and University of San Francisco.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Premium TV channels and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the condo's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the condo's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Inn at the Opera, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from War Memorial Opera House and minutes from California State Building. This family-friendly condo is close to Union Square and University of San Francisco.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

War Memorial Opera House - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
California State Building - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
San Francisco City Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Louise Davies Symphony Hall - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
SFJAZZ Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Civic Center Plaza - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Asian Art Museum of San Francisco - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bill Graham Civic Auditorium - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
New Conservatory Theater Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
San Francisco Public Library - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Pioneer's Monument - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
San Francisco African American Historical and Cultural Society - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
United Nations Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
San Francisco Zen Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Orpheum Theater - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
San Francisco, CA (SFO-San Francisco Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Oakland, CA (OAK-Oakland Intl.) - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi

The preferred airport for Inn at the Opera is San Francisco, CA (SFO-San Francisco Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
